name: runSyncExit
signature: { <A, E, R>(runtime: Runtime<R>, effect: Effect<A, E, R>): Exit<A, E>; <R>(runtime: Runtime<R>): <A, E>(effect: Effect<A, E, R>) => Exit<A, E>; }
description:
Executes the effect synchronously returning the exit. This method is effectful and should only be invoked at the edges of your
program.
documentation:
Executes the effect synchronously returning the exit.

This method is effectful and should only be invoked at the edges of your
program.
